page.title: 08FAMOUS PEOPLE
page.content: {EDMUND LUDLOW}is associated with MANOR FARM,the ancient manor house of Charlton Adam.He was one of Cromwell's major-generals who required little persuasion to sign the death warrant of Charles 1.Ludlow's sister,Margaret,married Giles Strangways who inherited Manor Farm and after the Restoration the house was twice searched by government forces looking for LUDLOW. Two of the Lyte family were famous. {HENRY LYTE}wrote LYTE'S HERBAL,an early book on herbal{medicine:HENRY {FRANCIS LYTE(1793-1847)}wrote such famous hymns as'Abide with me'and 'Praise my soul,the King of Heaven'. On a more recentlevel,the television{actress,Diane Keen,was married in Charlton Mackrell Church,her mother being a resident of the village.
